sentences.en: Against the swiss franc and the australian dollar the euro has hit all-time lows in the past month and just last week sank to a record low against the swedish krona.
sentences.cn: 过去一个月，欧元兑瑞士法郎和澳元的汇率跌至历史最低水平，欧元上周兑瑞典克朗的汇率则跌至创纪录低点。

sentences.en: Pound swedish krona swiss franc and canadian dollararealsotrading well above their burger benchmark.
sentences.cn: 英镑瑞典克朗瑞士法郎和加拿大元的汇率同样也是高于其汉堡包基准。

sentences.en: The British pound, Swedish krona, Swiss franc and Canadian dollar are also trading well above their burger benchmark.
sentences.cn: 英镑，瑞典克朗，瑞士法郎和加拿大元的汇率同样也是高于其汉堡包基准。

sentences.en: The krona has ceased functioning as a currency outside Iceland.
sentences.cn: 冰岛克朗在境外已经失去了货币功能.

sentences.en: This time the most conspicuous victim has been the Icelandic krona.
sentences.cn: 此次危机中最明显的受害者就是冰岛克朗.

words.tran_cn: 克朗（瑞典及冰岛的货币单位）

trans.tran_cn: 克朗（瑞典及冰岛的货币单位）
trans.tran_en: the standard unit of money in Sweden and Iceland
